description: This file defines a React component for a Tic Tac Toe game frontend, managing game state and rendering the UI components.

methods.name: handleMove
methods.description: Handles player's move on the board, checks for a winner or a draw, and updates the game state accordingly.

methods.name: handleNewGame
methods.description: Resets the game state for a new game with the specified game mode.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets the game state to the initial values, preserving the current game mode.
